￼2 Introduction Sunny places with Cafees and Restaurants all year around in a medievaléenvironment - - that is Vence in a nutshell... This link icon will take you to individual websites for each establishment. To download the newest version of our Magazine click on this icon. Places QUICKGUIDE

￼All about the icons The following icons will facilitate your navigation through the Magazine. Cafes Vence’s many cafes are ideal places to relax and watch the world go by, to meet and chat to residents or other tourists, or plan your next excursion. Galleries The “City of Arts” is home to many galleries, small and large. Each has its own theme, special artist or style of work. Some are hidden in interesting untravelled corners of the city. Beauty Whether tempted to try a new look or merely smartening up for a special evening out, Vence’s beauty parlours and hairdressers are at your service. Places Museums, Parks, Miscellaneous sites worth seeing... Real Estate Agents See how real people live on the Côte d’Azur by visiting sales properties with a choice of Real Estate Agents. Perhaps your visit will prove a good financial investment. Services If you can’t find what you’re looking for, it is probably listed here. 15 They appear at convenient places throughout the Magazine to help you jump from one section to another and back. Shopping No matter what type of gift or Provençale souvenir you would like to buy, you will find it in a shop here. Hotels Whether you are searching for superior comfort or a budget “bed and breakfast” you will find a hotel to suit your pocket and your style here. Restaurants Vence’s restaurants cater for every taste and pocket - from inexpensive “plat du jour” of local produce to exotic flavours from other lands or gourmet adventures.
